instruction: Name three types of social media platforms
output: There are three main types of social media platforms: microblogging (e.g. Twitter, Tumblr), social networking (e.g. Facebook, LinkedIn) and media sharing (e.g. Instagram, YouTube). Microblogs allow users to send short messages, such as tweets, to one another. Social networks enable users to form connections with other users and share personal information. Media sharing sites allow users to share photos, videos and other types of media.
